Detailed Description

Adds artid, edit, printing and tool menu items to wxMenu.

Member Enumeration Documentation

anonymous enum

The menu styles.

Enumerator:
MENU_IS_READ_ONLY 

readonly control

MENU_IS_SELECTED 

text is selected somewhere on the control

MENU_IS_EMPTY 

control is empty

MENU_ALLOW_CLEAR 

add clear item in menu

MENU_CAN_PASTE 

add paste item in menu

MENU_DEFAULT 

default

Appends a menu item for stock menu id's using automatic naming, help text and art id.

void wxExMenu::AppendEdit ( bool  add_invert = false  ) 

Appends edit menu items, depending on the style specified during construction.

void wxExMenu::AppendSeparator (  ) 

Appends a separator.

If previous item was a separator, it ignores this one. If no items have yet been appended, it ignores this one.

bool wxExMenu::AppendTools ( int  itemid = wxID_ANY  ) 

Appends a tools submenu.

Returns true if items have been appended.
